section.title: Create binding context entries
section.para: Select the Binding Contexts entry in your application model. Define a new entry with the org.eclipse.ui.contexts.dialogAndWindow ID. As name use "Windows and Dialogs".

textobject.phrase: How to add the Binding Context Entries

section.para:
Afterwards add the following sub-entries:
Binding context entries
ID Name
org.eclipse.ui.contexts.dialog Dialogs
org.eclipse.ui.contexts.window Windows
The resulting entry is depicted in the following screenshot.

textobject.phrase: How to add the Binding Context Entries

warning.para: The name attribute of a binding context entry is not allowed to be empty.

section.title: Create key bindings for a BindingContext
section.para:
Create a key binding for your Save command to the
M1 S
shortcut. Afterwards create a keybinding for your Exit command to the
M1 X
shortcut.
The required entries are depicted in the following screenshots.
